","^Oh wait, are you a...","
","^Oh. You have her here with you.","
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Oh hi.","
","^How have you been.","
","ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Save it.","
","^What is going on here?","
","ev",{"VAR?":"annoying_admit_thief"},"/ev",[{"->":".^.b","c":true},{"b":["
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Oh, I'm just helping this guy over here rob this place, that's all.","
","ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Of course you are.","
","^Have you even thought for a second what you are doing?","
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Something cool?","
","ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^This is exactly what I mean.","
","^You don't think.","
","^You just do things.","
","^That's why nobody likes you.","
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^What?","
","^Everyone likes me!","
","ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^But with that in mind.","
","^I'd like to join.","
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Huh?","
","^Then what was that speach for?","
","ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^It doesn't matter what is your conclusion, what matters is how you get to it.","
","^I have nothing to lose.","
","^And I know I'll get a kick out of annoying upper management.","
",{"->":"proposition"},{"->":"intro.35"},null]}],"nop","

","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Oh, I'm just helping this guy over here do inspections.","
","ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Inspections?","
","^God, you are dumb.","
","^What kind of inspections, would he be doing here?","
","^Nobody cares about what happens here!","
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^You lied to me?","
","^Listen, I am a fan of crimes, but you have hurt me on a personnal level.","
","ev",{"x()":"hurt_morale"},"pop","/ev","
","ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Hey, you guy, are you gonna do something bad?","

","^No matter, I'm in.","
","^Even if it's with her.","
",{"->":"proposition"},{"->":"intro.42"},null]}],"nop","
